privacy.html:
, we guarantee a news processing latency of
                            less than 30 seconds for critical global events affecting core business verticals.

ALTHR guarantees 99.9% availability of all
                            hosted logic engines. Scheduled maintenance is conducted during UTC off-peak hours with
                            48-hour notice.

ALTHR is responsible for the integrity of the automation architecture. Client-side
                        errors in third-party API configurations are the responsibility of the client, although ALTHR
                        provides diagnostic support.

Access to ALTHR Agency Systems is granted on a per-seat or per-workflow basis as
                        defined in the master service agreement. Unauthorized reverse-engineering of logic engines is
                        strictly prohibited.

All data at rest is encrypted using AES-256 protocols. Transit data is secured via
                        TLS 1.3. Local
                        AI fine-tuning remains within the client's firewall.

All data processed through ALTHR systems remains the exclusive property of the
                        client. We do not sell, lease, or share granular business intelligence with third-party AI
                        aggregators.

If uptime falls below 99.0%, a 10%
                            monthly service credit is applied. Below 95.0% results in a 25% credit.

Standard service cycles are 12 months. Early termination requires 90-day notice during which
                        offboarding sequences will preserve data integrity.

Tier 1 issues (System Down) results
                            in engineering intervention within 15 minutes. Tier 2 (Partial Impairment) is addressed
                            within 4 hours.

Transforming complexity into automated simplicity through high-end engineering and strategic
                        logic systems.

We collect operational telemetry solely for the purpose of optimizing system
                        performance and ensuring protocol compliance. This includes API response times, workflow
                        latency, and error logs.

We process public domain market news and sentiment data to provide competitive advantages. This
                        data is merged with client operational telemetry to create predictive scaling models. Our
                        systems can, for example, monitor global gold prices to automatically adjust jewelry inventory
                        pricing pipelines in real-time, ensuring maximum capital efficiency.
